An international team of experts has dismissed prostate cancer as official cause of death for Pablo Neruda, Chilean Nobel Prize winner. For decades, his family and associates have claimed Neruda was poisoned...they confirmed finding traces of highly infectious bacteria in the late poet's remains.

800 Britons made fake food poisoning claims: Dozens of British citizens have been identified after making fake claims of food poisoning to pay for their holidays in Spain. British authorities have vowed to punish those involved in the criminal scheme.
